wiki.content:
This is one of his better songs.  It really shows his unique style, and his mellow grace.

wiki.summary: This is one of his better songs.  It really shows his unique style, and his mellow grace.

track.name: Crying Time
comments: Been crying time for over 41 months now...
Jesus, what a terrible version... This should be declared toxic waste and bagged and tagged before it spreads.
This is a fantastic song. I love him!
one of the best country singers
After watching "Ray," I bought a 5 cd box set of his songs.
It simply can't get any better than this. Sing it, Ray!

Brother Ray!
www.kabl960.com
Sunday Sounds 10am - 1pm PST
Much love for Ray Charles.  Just hearing him puts a smile on my face. What an incredible man and musician.  That man had some heart AND soul. God Bless you and keep you Mr. Charles, much respect....
